title: Node
description: The interface for any `Node` that is serialized using the `Codable` protocol and the polymorphic serialization defined by this framework.

comment.description: A developer-facing comment about this node.

shouldHideActions.description: A list of buttons that should be hidden even if the default is to show them.

actions.description: A mapping of button action to content information for that button.

nextStepIdentifier.description: Used in direct navigation to allow the node to indicate that the navigator should jump to the given node identifier.

webConfig.description: A blob of JSON that can be used by a web-based survey building tool.

title.description: The primary text to display for the node in a localized string. The UI should display this using a larger font.

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display for the node in a localized string.

detail.description: Detail text to display for the node in a localized string.

image.description: An image or animation to display with this node.

optional.description: If `true`, then the forward button should *always* enabled. If `false`, then the forward button should be disabled until the question is answered. This is different from "skipping" a question. Whether or not the skip button is shown in the UI is defined by the `shouldHideActions` property.

uiHint.description: This is a "hint" that can be used to vend a view that is appropriate to the given question. If the library responsible for rendering the question doesn't know how to handle the hint, then it will be ignored.

surveyRules.description: A list of rules that may be applied to determine navigation.

baseType.description: The json type of the choices in this collection. The `value` for all choices should be either of the same json type or null.

singleChoice.description: Is there a single choice for this question? (Default = true)

choices.description: The list of choices for this question.

other.description: An input item that defines the properties of the textfield used to add free text as another choice.

comment.description: A developer-facing comment about this node.

shouldHideActions.description: A list of buttons that should be hidden even if the default is to show them.

actions.description: A mapping of button action to content information for that button.

nextStepIdentifier.description: Used in direct navigation to allow the node to indicate that the navigator should jump to the given node identifier.

webConfig.description: A blob of JSON that can be used by a web-based survey building tool.

title.description: The primary text to display for the node in a localized string. The UI should display this using a larger font.

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display for the node in a localized string.

detail.description: Detail text to display for the node in a localized string.

image.description: An image or animation to display with this node.

spokenInstructions.description: A mapping of a localized spoken instruction to a key where the key is either 'start' or 'end'.

actions.description: A mapping of button action to content information for that button.

nextStepIdentifier.description: Used in direct navigation to allow the node to indicate that the navigator should jump to the given node identifier.

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display for the node in a localized string.

detail.description: Detail text to display for the node in a localized string.

image.description: An image or animation to display with this node.

spokenInstructions.description: A mapping of a localized spoken instruction to a key where the key is either 'start' or 'end'.

fullInstructionsOnly.description: Should this instruction step be displayed when displaying full instructions only?

comment.description: A developer-facing comment about this node.

shouldHideActions.description: A list of buttons that should be hidden even if the default is to show them.

actions.description: A mapping of button action to content information for that button.

nextStepIdentifier.description: Used in direct navigation to allow the node to indicate that the navigator should jump to the given node identifier.

webConfig.description: A blob of JSON that can be used by a web-based survey building tool.

title.description: The primary text to display for the node in a localized string. The UI should display this using a larger font.

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display for the node in a localized string.

detail.description: Detail text to display for the node in a localized string.

image.description: An image or animation to display with this node.

spokenInstructions.description: A mapping of a localized spoken instruction to a key where the key is either 'start' or 'end'.

fullInstructionsOnly.description: Should this instruction step be displayed when displaying full instructions only?

value.description: The matching value is any json element, but all json elements within the collection of choices should have the same json type.

text.description: A localized string to show as the selection label.

detail.description: Additional detail to display below the primary label.

icon.description: An image associated with this choice.

selectorType.description:
Does selecting this choice mean that the other options should be deselected or selected as well?
For example, this can be used in a multiple selection question to allow for a 'none of the above' choice that is `exclusive` to the other items or an 'all of the above' choice that should select `all` other choices as well (except those that are marked as `exclusive`).

matchingAnswer.description: The json value to evaluate against a result answer.

skipToIdentifier.description: The node identifier or reversed key to jump to if the answer matches.

ruleOperator.description: The rule operator to apply to the result comparison.

title.description: The localized title for the icon.

comment.description: A developer-facing comment about this node.

shouldHideActions.description: A list of buttons that should be hidden even if the default is to show them.

actions.description: A mapping of button action to content information for that button.

nextStepIdentifier.description: Used in direct navigation to allow the node to indicate that the navigator should jump to the given node identifier.

webConfig.description: A blob of JSON that can be used by a web-based survey building tool.

title.description: The primary text to display for the node in a localized string. The UI should display this using a larger font.

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display for the node in a localized string.

detail.description: Detail text to display for the node in a localized string.

image.description: An image or animation to display with this node.

permissions.description: A list of permissions to request for this assessment.

icons.description: A list of icons associated with this overview screen.

permissionType.description: The permission type to request when showing this step.

optional.description: Whether or not the permission is required to continue.

restrictedMessage.description: The localized message to display when the permission is restricted. Typically, this is only shown when the permission is not optional.

deniedMessage.description: The localized message to display when the permission is denied. Typically, this is only shown when the permission is not optional.

actions.description: A mapping of button action to content information for that button.

title.description: The primary text to display for the node in a localized string. The UI should display this using a larger font.

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display for the node in a localized string.

detail.description: Detail text to display for the node in a localized string.

image.description: An image or animation to display with this node.

steps.description: A sequential list of the nodes to display for this assessment or section.

asyncActions.description: A list of elements used to describe the configuration for background actions.

comment.description: A developer-facing comment about this node.

shouldHideActions.description: A list of buttons that should be hidden even if the default is to show them.

actions.description: A mapping of button action to content information for that button.

nextStepIdentifier.description: Used in direct navigation to allow the node to indicate that the navigator should jump to the given node identifier.

webConfig.description: A blob of JSON that can be used by a web-based survey building tool.

title.description: The primary text to display for the node in a localized string. The UI should display this using a larger font.

subtitle.description: A subtitle to display for the node in a localized string.

detail.description: Detail text to display for the node in a localized string.

image.description: An image or animation to display with this node.

optional.description: If `true`, then the forward button should *always* enabled. If `false`, then the forward button should be disabled until the question is answered. This is different from "skipping" a question. Whether or not the skip button is shown in the UI is defined by the `shouldHideActions` property.

uiHint.description: This is a "hint" that can be used to vend a view that is appropriate to the given question. If the library responsible for rendering the question doesn't know how to handle the hint, then it will be ignored.

surveyRules.description: A list of rules that may be applied to determine navigation.

inputItem.description: The single text input for this question.

identifier.description: The identifier associated with the task, step, or asynchronous action.
